column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Last year we attended a rehearsal dinner at Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba and it was wonderful!  My boyfriend
column2: who didn't think he liked tapas
column3: loved the food and we had a great time there.  So
column4: when it came time for us to find a caterer for our wedding
column5: we called Ba-Ba-Reeba.  I worked with their special events manager
column6: Alison.  She was great to work with!  She was very professional and quick to respond to my many questions.  We actually decided to hold our wedding out of state
column7: but if we had gotten married in Chicago I would have booked Ba-Ba-Reeba in a heartbeat.
